STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: The Ultimate Platform for Food Enthusiasts
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it, see what others are saying about our food-building app!
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized the way I create dishes! The intuitive interface and vast ingredient library make building new recipes a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy parent, I love how quickly I can plan out healthy, delicious meals for my family using this app. It's a total game-changer!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm experimenting with flavors or sticking to tried-and-true classics, this food-building app has become an invaluable tool in my kitchen.
TESTIMONIAL_GIVER_3_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOL: Passionate home cook and food blogger
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Food Building App
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about constructing delicious cuisine
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kind of foods can I build with this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to virtually construct any type of food dish or meal you can imagine! From simple sandwiches to elaborate multi-course feasts, the possibilities are endless.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Do I need any special equipment or skills?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Not at all! Our user-friendly interface and intuitive building tools make food construction accessible to everyone, regardless of culinary skills or experience.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I share my food creations with others?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! You can showcase your virtual culinary masterpieces by sharing photos and recipes through our built-in social sharing features.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is there a way to get real-life recipes from my virtual dishes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, our app provides the ability to export detailed recipes based on the foods you've constructed virtually. This allows you to recreate your digital creations in your own kitchen!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How often is new food content added?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Our team is constantly working on expanding the selection of ingredients and recipe options available. We release new food packs and updates on a regular basis to keep things fresh and exciting!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Our app makes meal planning and cooking a breeze. Discover new recipes, manage your ingredients, and bring your culinary visions to life.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing the future of food creation
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our app streamlines recipe planning, grocery shopping, and meal preparation. Cook like a pro with step-by-step guidance.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: Our app helps you discover delicious recipes and plan your meals with ease.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Say goodbye to meal prep stress and hello to tasty adventures in your kitchen!
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: With FoodBuilder, you have access to thousands of recipes from around the world.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Transform your cooking routine into a joyful experience with our user-friendly tools.
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_ALREADY_HAVE_ACCOUNT_P: Already a kitchen pro? Log in
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log in to your Kitchen Account
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Revolutionize your cooking experience with FoodBuilder. Craft delectable meals, explore mouthwatering recipes, and streamline your culinary journey like never before.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Source the finest local and seasonal produce for your culinary creations.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Tailor recipes to your taste and dietary needs with our user-friendly recipe builder.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Stay organized with our meal planner that generates shopping lists and schedules.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Step-by-step guides with photos and videos to master cooking techniques.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Connect with fellow food lovers, share your dishes, and get inspired.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Log your meals and get detailed breakdowns of calories, macros, and nutrients.
CTA_BODY: Discover the joy of crafting delectable dishes with our intuitive app for building mouthwatering meals. From curating ingredients to mastering cooking techniques, we're your ultimate companion in the kitchen.
HERO_SUBTITLE: An innovative app for culinary enthusiasts and aspiring chefs.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Craft delicious meals with our intuitive tools
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch for Building Your Food App
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's discuss how we can craft a delicious digital experience for your food business.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: A vibrant selection of nutrient-rich veggies from local growers.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Ripe, juicy fruits picked at peak flavor for your meals.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Handcrafted loaves made with ancient grains and natural leavening.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: High-quality cuts of beef, pork and poultry raised responsibly.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Wild-caught fish and shellfish from well-managed fisheries.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Farm-fresh dairy, eggs and other wholesome products.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Common Questions About Our Food Building App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What can I build with this app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to design and virtually construct all kinds of dishes and meals. Explore different ingredients, flavors, and plating styles to bring your culinary visions to life.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Is this for professional chefs only?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Not at all! While professional chefs can definitely benefit from our app's advanced features, it's designed to be accessible and fun for food enthusiasts of all skill levels.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I share my food designs?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app has built-in social sharing capabilities so you can showcase your delicious creations with friends, family, and the entire food-loving community.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is there a way to get cooking instructions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, once you've finished designing your dish, our app can generate a step-by-step recipe with cooking instructions tailored to your specific creation.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Explore a vast collection of appetizing recipes from around the world, with easy-to-follow instructions and mouth-watering photos.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Create weekly meal plans tailored to your dietary preferences and grocery lists with just a few taps.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Join a vibrant community of food lovers, share your culinary creations, and receive feedback and inspiration from fellow foodies.
